hero.title: Weekly meal plans for a healthy lifestyle
hero.subtitle: Experience fresh, delicious, and nutritious clean meals

step1.title: Choose Your Plan
step1.description: Select a meal plan that fits your needs and fill in the delivery information

step2.title: Chayfood Cooks
step2.description: We select the best ingredients and cook in a modern industrial kitchen

step3.title: Delivery
step3.description: Chayfood's delivery team will deliver meals to your door every day

step4.title: Enjoy
step4.description: No need to think, shop, or cook, just heat and enjoy!
